慓字的基本解释

慓
piāo
古同“剽”②。

慓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piào］
［《廣韻》匹妙切，去笑，滂。］
［《廣韻》撫招切，平宵，滂。］
［《廣韻》苻少切，上小，並。］
(1)急疾。
(2)勇猛。参见“慓果”。

慓字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慓； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页398第29
【廣韻】撫招切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】紕招切，?音飄。【博雅】急也。　又【廣韻】苻少切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】婢小切，?音摽。又【集韻】匹沼切，音漂。義?同。　通作剽。

慓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
慓字的起名意思

暂无。

piāo
Gu Tong's "剽"②.
Shove
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［piào］
["Guangyun" is a wonderful cut, laugh, grimacing. ]
["Guang Yun" caress and cuts, flat night, stern. ]
["Guangyun" Fu less cut, upper small, combined. ]
(1) Emergency.
(2) Bravery. See "fruits".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　慓; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 398 29
[Guang Yun] Caress and cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] You move and cut, and the sound floats. [Bo Ya] Anxious too.　[Guangyun] Fu Shaoqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Club] [Zhengyun] Maid Xiaoqie,? Yin 摽. Also 【Jiyun】Pipe marsh cut, sound drifting. Righteous? Same.　Tong made a plaster.
